content:
Based on the new execution logs, I'll update the report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area at position(0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at position(0,0) processing iron ore
- Furnace 2 at position(2,0) processing iron ore

###Copper Smelting Area at position(4,4)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Furnace 3 at position(4,4) processing copper ore
- Furnace 4 at position(6,4) processing copper ore

###Power Generation System
Components:
- Steam engine at position(-7.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-7.5, 25.5)
- Connected by pipe groups at positions(-7.5, 15.5), (-7.5, 20.5), and (-8.5, 23.5)
- Extensive electrical network with multiple poles spanning positions from (-10.5,15.5) to (5.5,15.5)

###Research Lab Complex
Multiple labs positioned across the map:
- Lab at position(-7.5, 8.5) with 14 automation science packs
- Lab at position(-3.5, 8.5) with 8 automation science packs
- Lab at position(8.5, 8.5) with 165 automation science packs
- Lab at position(7.5, 12.5) with 9 automation science packs
- Lab at position(6.5, 17.5) with 17 automation science packs
- Lab at position(3.5, 19.5) with 17 automation science packs
- Lab at position(-3.5, 22.5) with 9 automation science packs
- Lab at position(6.5, 22.5) with 17 automation science packs
- Lab at position(10.5, 21.5) with 17 automation science packs
- Lab at position(10.5, 23.5) with 20 automation science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Power Management Issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power supply
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to prevent power outages
- Harvest coal before boiler runs completely empty

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in furnaces to maintain continuous smelting operations
- Keep track of iron plate inventory before attempting to craft gear wheels
- Ensure sufficient materials are available before starting crafting chains

### Crafting Efficiency
- Plan crafting sequences to maintain required intermediate products
- Maintain minimum iron plate stock before attempting to craft gear wheels
- Calculate required resources for automation science pack crafting chain

### Research Setup Issues
- Ensure prerequisites are researched before attempting advanced technologies
- Cannot research Logistics 2 without first researching Logistics
- When using prototype attributes, use correct naming (e.g., SciencePack1 instead of LogisticSciencePack)

### Inventory Management
- Maintain sufficient coal reserves for both power generation and smelting operations
- Keep track of required ingredients for multi-step crafting processes
- When crafting items that require multiple steps, ensure you have enough base materials before starting
